K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:131b-1: aa bhi dha na autta ra tantra n'a ma //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:136a-1: rdo rje he ru ka dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:136a-4: rigs drug po de ni; yan lag drug tu dgod pa ste /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:136a-6: thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa las byung ngo [?]//

K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:136a-9: rdo rje dbang phyug chen mo ya mi ni dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:136a-10: rdo rje dbang phyug chen mo rmongs byed ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:136a-11: rdo rje dbang phyug chen mo g-yo byed ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:136a-12: rdo rje dbang phyug chen mo skrag byed ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:136a-13: rdo rje dbang phyug chen po tsanti ka ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:136a-14: 'di lta bus yang nam mkha'i khams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:136a-15: chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi gnyis su med pa'i dam tshig yang dag par srung ba'i sbyor ba'i thugs gsang ba chen po ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:136a-16: de lta bu sna tshogs du ma'i rnal 'byor ma rang gi lag pas khrag dron mo mchog gis mchod pa byas nas thal mo sbyar te mos pa mchog gis spyi bos gtugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:136a-17: de nas dam tshig chen po rnam par 'phrul pa rdo rje sna tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:136b-0: rang gi ba spu'i bu gnas sems dpa' sna tshogs spros te phyung nas gdul ba du ma la @136b thabs sna tshogs pa ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i chos kyi dbyings yongs su gang bar byas te sna tshogs pas mdun gyi nam mkha' yongs su gang bar mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:136b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs sna tshogs pa'i snying rje chen po'i khro bo'i cha lugs 'dzin cing sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir gnyis su med pa'i ro dga' ba sna tshogs kyi cho 'phrul rdul snyed dang mnyam pa bstan te khams gsum gyi bdag pos gsungs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:136b-5: dbang chen gyi steng du sna tshogs pa'i ri'i rgyal po ri rab sna tshogs rin po che sna tshogs pa'i gzi brjid kyis mdzes pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:136b-6: de'i steng du dpal rdo rje sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings las rdo rje khro bo chen po phyung nas spros te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:136b-7: rdo rje chen po'i gzhal yas khang dkyil 'khor chen por sprul pa la kun tu bzang po chen po byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:136b-8: rdo rje 'khor dang lhan cig byung nas brtan par bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:136b-9: phun sum tshogs pa sna tshogs pas brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:136b-10: rdo rje rin po che'i rgyan gyis spud pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:136b-11: zla ba dang nyi ma'i mdog ltar sdug pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:136b-15: g-yer ka'i dra bas mig mang ris su bris pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:136b-16: rdo rje dam tshig srad bu chos kyi 'khor lo la 'jug pa'i sgra sgrog pa sna tshogs pa'i lha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:137a-15: lce spyang mo'i sgra sgrog pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:137a-19: aa la la'i sgra sgrog pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:137a-22: mgo bcad pa gar byed pas nye bar brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:137a-23: bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i spyod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:137a-24: dge ba'i las kyis grol ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:137a-25: sems can thams cad la snying rje'i ros phan 'dogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:137a-27: padma'i gar gyis gar byed cing thal mo sbyor ba; g-yas brkyang bas gnas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:137a-28: lag pa'i thal mo sbyar ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:137a-29: sangs rgyas thod pa'i dum bu'i chos kyi mchog zab mo'i tshul dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:137a-30: khro bo'i rgyal po chen po'i 'dod pa ston pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:137a-34: mngon par brjod pa'i bla ma chen mo nye bar 'byung ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:137a-35: mkha' 'gro dang mkha' 'gro ma'i sdom pa'i rgyal po'i dra ba'i dra ba can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:137a-36: chos sna tshogs pa'i rjes su bstan pa'i ston pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:137b-0: sems can gyi bsam pa sna tshogs kyi bde ba ster zhing ston @137b par byed pa sems dpa' chen po legs so legs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:137b-1: lag na rdo rje legs par nyon cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:137b-2: mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:137b-3: zhu ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o;; ;;de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la rdo rje gsang ba'i snying po gsungs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:137b-4: snying gar zla ba bsgoms nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:137b-5: rdo rje phra mo'i rnam 'phral ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:137b-6: bde gshegs thams cad gsang ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:137b-7: mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba'i sngom //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:138b-11: 'di ltar ji nye ba'i dur khrod kyi bar thams cad rnam par dag par shes par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:138b-12: pu dza ao aa gor de ma ka ao tri ko ka la ka ham pre gri soo su na si ma ku /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:138b-13: sa bcu rnam par dag pa'i bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:138b-14: pha rol phyin bcu'ang de bzhin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:138b-15: shes pa bcu yang rnam dag bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:138b-16: bcu po de dag rnam par bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:138b-17: 'khor lo gsum yang yongs dag phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:138b-18: nyi shu rtsa bzhi bdag nyid dge /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:138b-19: dus dang tshod rnams rnam grol bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:138b-20: rnal 'byor ma yi yid dga' ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:138b-21: sum cu rtsa bdun rnam dag don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:138b-22: mngon mtho he ru ka las byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:138b-23: mngon brjod rgyud ni bla ma'i bla //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:138b-24: gsang chen mchog gi dam pa 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:138b-25: g-yon dang g-yas su bskor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:138b-26: dgod cing mchod dang bskor bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:138b-27: gang gis de nyid shes pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:138b-28: brda ni lnga po bstan par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:139a-1: pa la; ;gzhan du de nyid ma bstan cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:139a-2: mngon brjod rgyud la bla ma yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:139a-3: dbang bskur slob ma dag la sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:139a-4: gzhan du slob ma smyo ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:139a-5: brgyal dang rmongs pa dag tu 'gro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:139a-6: mnar med 'jigs pa chen po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:139a-7: ngan pa der ni lhung bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:139a-8: glegs bam bshes min la ster ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:139a-9: ngan pa de ma thag tu 'chi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:139a-10: phol mig rims dang dug dang nad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:139a-12: mi srun bgegs dang tshogs bdag gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:139a-13: gsod cing dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:139a-14: ji srid 'bad pa thams cad kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:139a-15: bla ma slob mas rim bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:139a-16: de nyid rtag tu sbas na ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:139a-17: myur du sngags kyi dngos grub 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:139a-18: bla mas thams cad rim bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:139a-19: mngon brjod rgyud kyi rim pa bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:139a-20: lha yi rnal 'byor la sbyor ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:139a-21: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:139a-22: de ma thag tu byang chub ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:139a-23: mchog ni nges par rnyed par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:139a-25: bdag gi dam tshig mi shes shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:139a-26: drag cing log lta rang bzhin ngan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:139a-27: mi srun snying rje med pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:139a-28: brkam chags ser snar ldan pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:139a-29: spyang zhing ngan la phrag dog can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:139a-30: skyes pa gzhan la chags pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:139a-31: rnam par rtog pa mang ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:139a-33: sbyor ba'i dngos grub ring ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:139b-0: pukka s'i ni mdzes @139b sdug [?] blang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:139b-1: gzugs sdug gzhon pas rnam par brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:139b-2: sbyor ba la ni gcig tu sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:139b-3: brtul zhugs brtan zhing dam tshig shes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:139b-4: dpa' zhing chags bral ngo tsha med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:139b-5: nga rgyal med cing ser sna med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:139b-6: sngags pa rang gi spyod pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:139b-7: rig ma brtul zhugs khyod kyis longs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:139b-8: phyag rgya lnga ni rtag tu 'chang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:139b-9: mgo la thod pa'i rgyan yang byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:139b-10: thod pa dang ni kha tv'am 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:139b-11: thal ba'i rdul gyis rnam par byugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:139b-12: rtag tu ma h'a m'a sa bza'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:139b-13: thams cad btung bas myos pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:139b-14: ro yi gdan la 'dug pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:139b-15: pags pa chen po gos su gyon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:139b-16: rjes su mthun pa'i bza' ba za //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:139b-17: zhag dang khrag gis tshim pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:139b-18: grong ngam dgon pa dag tu yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:139b-19: gang zhig yul du 'gro ba na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:139b-20: rtag tu chags bas mi gnas shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:139b-21: rtag tu dur khrod spyod byed la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:139b-22: yang na tshong 'dus gnas pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:139b-23: nyan thos 'jig rten skal med pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:139b-24: mi shes gti mug gis khyab pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:139b-25: nyan thos yongs su longs spyod pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:139b-26: gtsug lag khang du gnas mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:139b-27: ji ltar skyes bu dbul po bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:139b-28: byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:139b-29: rdo rje gar gyis rnam par rol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:139b-30: rtag tu dur khrod la gnas shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:139b-31: dri chen sha chen zas su bza'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:139b-32: myos byed btung bar ldan pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:139b-33: dpa' ba'i gtso bos rtse gcig pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:139b-34: sems kyis rab tu bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:140a-1: rnyed na; ;g-yeng ba thams cad rnam spangs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:140a-2: de ni ye shes 'byung gnas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:140a-3: shes rab pha rol phyin las 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:140a-4: gzung dngos yin pa mi dmigs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:140a-5: gnyis su med pa nyid la gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:140a-6: rtse gcig sems ni byas nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:140a-7: sgom pa'i spyod pa la gnas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:140a-8: bde la dga' ba'i dngos grub 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:140a-9: shes rab thabs kyi cho ga'i rim //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:140a-10: phyag rgya che dang nges par rol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:140a-11: sgom pa mngon du gyur pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:140a-12: rnam grol sangs rgyas thams cad kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:140a-14: g-yon pa'i spyod pa shes rab ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:140a-15: g-yas pa de bzhin thabs yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:140a-16: sgom par ldan pa'i mthu stobs ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:140a-17: sum cu'i dbang phyug la dbang byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:140a-18: rnal 'byor ma ni dngos grub dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:140a-19: gnod sbyin klu yi bu mo dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:140a-20: gzhan yang sna tshogs dri za mo /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:140a-21: 'dod pa'i longs spyod dag la spyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:140a-22: de nyid gsang ba'i mchog gyur pa; ;a'a li k'a li rtag tu bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:140a-23: rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:140a-24: thams cad de bzhin rnam par brtag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:140a-25: dpa' bos brda rnams bstan pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:140a-26: rnal 'byor pa yi lag g-yon gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:140a-27: brda rnams la ni 'jug par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:140a-28: dpa' bo'i gnas su gyur pa 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:140a-29: rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'jig rten gsum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:140a-30: 'gro kun g-yon las byung ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:140b-0: @140b rdo rje sems dpa' mthe bong nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:140b-1: mdzub mor rnam par snang mdzad bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:140b-2: gung mor padma gar dbang gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:140b-3: srin lag dpa' bo dngos grub can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:140b-4: tha ma la ni mi zad sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:140b-5: sen mo'i ngos la rta mgrin gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:140b-6: g-yon pa'i rgyu las byung ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:140b-7: dpa' bo thams cad yin par bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:140b-8: lag mthil pho nya 'dus pa'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:140b-9: rgyab tu shin tu nges byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:140b-10: brda ni lnga po brtan par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:140b-11: sgrub pa po yis shes par gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:140b-12: sa ni spyan zhes bya bar bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:140b-13: chu khams m'a ma k'i ru bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:140b-14: me ni gos dkar mo ru bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:140b-15: rlung ni sgrol ma dag tu grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:140b-16: 'o byed ma ni stong pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:140b-17: de bzhin pha rol phyin pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:140b-18: dbus kyi dpa' bo thams cad ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:140b-19: mkhas pas rgyab tu gshegs su gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:140b-20: gsang ba 'di ni mi bstan cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:140b-21: rab tu 'bad de sba bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:140b-22: de ltar brda yis dpa' bo rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:140b-23: de dang lhan cig bza' ba bza'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:140b-24: dpa' bos thams cad mnyam sbyor ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:140b-25: mkha' 'gro dra ba'i bde mchog yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:140b-26: phan tshun rjes 'gro thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:140b-27: sna tshogs brda ni bshad par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:140b-28: mkha' 'gro ma yi mtshan nyid dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:140b-29: pho nya rnams kyi mtshan nyid dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:140b-30: sgrub pa po la phan pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:140b-31: de dag thams cad bshad par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:140b-32: ras bris dang ni sku gzugs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:140b-33: 'bri na de bzhin dam tshig dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:141a-2: gang gis sgrub pa po 'grub pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:141a-3: sna tshogs sngags kyis mdzes pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:141a-4: phun sum tshogs pa'i dkyil 'khor dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:141a-5: lha yi dam tshig yid 'ong ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:141a-6: rnal 'byor ma ni sna tshogs mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:141a-7: dpa' bo sna tshogs yid 'ong ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:141a-10: rang rigs sna tshogs mchog dam pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:141a-11: bla ma brgyud pa'i bka' bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:141a-12: slob ma la ni phan pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:141a-13: bdag po'i las la shin tu mkhas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:141a-14: sngags dang rgyud la legs par bslabs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:141a-15: gzhan yang cho ga'i rim pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:141a-16: mngon brjod bla ma'i las la mkhas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:141a-17: phyugs kyi mtshan nyid sngags pas rtogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:141a-18: sna tshogs rigs kyi khyad par dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:141a-19: rnal 'byor ma yi spyod pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:141a-20: mkha' 'gro ma yang de bzhin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:141a-21: phyi rol ma mo'i phyag rgya dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:141a-22: phag mo yi ni rigs las byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:141a-23: dpa' po kun gyi spyod pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:141a-24: 'khor lo'i spyod pa shin tu bslabs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:141a-25: phyi yi rnal 'byor dbang phyug gi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:141a-26: mtshan nyid spyod pa dag la mkhas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:141a-27: he ru ka dpal rigs las byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:141a-28: dge ba'i spyod pa dag la bslabs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:141a-29: yul gyi spyod pa'i khyad par dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:141a-30: slob dpon spyod pa dag la mkhas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:141b-0: rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud spyod @141b dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:141b-1: rnal 'byor rgyud ni rgya che ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:141b-2: bya ba'i rgyud kyi dbye ba'i rim //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:141b-3: thams cad rgyud rnams rnam par shes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:141b-4: 'grub pa'i lung dang bstan bcos dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:141b-5: mdo sde skyes rabs de bzhin te; ;bla na med pa'i spyod pa dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:141b-6: shes rab pha rol phyin las byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:141b-7: phyi rol bstan bcos yongs la mkhas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:141b-8: phun sum tshogs pa slob dpon mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:141b-9: sbyor ba'i sgom par ldan pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:141b-10: yid gnyis med pa nyid kyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:141b-11: bza' ba thams cad bza' bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:141b-12: yi ge brgya pas thams cad du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:141b-13: gsang sngags brtan par bsgoms nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:141b-14: rang gi ming dang ldan par ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:141b-15: gcig tu spel nas bzla bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:141b-16: rtag tu phreng ba'i sngags kyang bzla //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:141b-18: bla ma las kyang bla ma ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:141b-19: mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba'i sdom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:141b-20: gsang sngags btus pas go cha dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:141b-21: snying po dang ni nye snying dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:141b-22: gsang sngags btus par rjes su bsrung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:141b-23: dkyil 'khor shin tu mdzes pa la; ;yi ge'i dkyil 'khor legs bkod nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:141b-24: dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams bskyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:141b-25: 'di ni gsang sngags thams cad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:141b-26: ma mo rnams kyi dam pa mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:141b-27: gsang ba dga' ba sbas pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:141b-28: gsang sngags thams cad bsdus pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:141b-29: gsang sngags kun gyi gnas yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:142a-3: sgom pa 'di ni mchog yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:142a-4: 'dod pa'i dngos grub bla na med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:142a-6: rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang rnyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:142a-7: byams pa'i go cha bgos pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:142a-8: snying rje chos kyi go cha yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:142a-9: shes rab mtshon char ldan pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:142a-10: nyon mongs bdud ni rnam par spangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:142a-11: phyir ldog chen mos srung ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:142a-12: rdo rje zhal bzhis rnam par mtshan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:142a-13: sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:142a-14: kha sbyar gsum gyi rdo rjes mtshan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:142a-15: thams cad mchog gi srung ba che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:142a-16: dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:142a-17: bka' yi 'khor lo srung ba che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:142a-18: phur bus bgegs med dngos grub 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:142a-19: srung ba mchog ni 'di dag gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:142a-20: sgrub pa po la byang chub stsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:142a-21: rdo rje phur bus ra ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:142a-22: rdo rje'i sa dang dra ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:142a-23: steng gi gur dang bla re yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:142a-24: gdug pa'i bdud ni bskrad byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:142a-25: mi gsod gsod pa med pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:142a-26: gang gis rang sems thul ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:142a-27: bdag gi sems ni bcings pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:142a-28: gang la gang gis gsod pa yin; ;mnyam pa'i sems ni dri yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:142a-29: gru bzhi pa ni byug pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:142a-30: tsandan dkar po lus yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:142a-31: mnyam par gnas pa nyid yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:142b-0: me tog bzod pa rnal @142b 'byor pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:142b-1: 'bad pas gtor pa yin par bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:142b-2: rang bzhin dag pa bdug pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:142b-3: mnyam pa'i sgom pa bdug pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:142b-4: mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma chen pe las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:142b-5: de kho na nyid kyi snying po'i don dam pa bstan pa ste le'u gsum pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:142b-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mkha' 'gros de kho na nyid kyi gsang ba gsungs pa; de nas yang dag bshad bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:142b-7: mngon brjod rgyud ni bla ma'i bla //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:142b-8: bla ma brgyud pas bshad pa bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:142b-9: phyi rol rnam rtog spangs nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:142b-10: mnyam pa'i dam tshig mchog dam pa; ;rtog pa med cing dpyod pa med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:142b-11: 'jigs pa thams cad rnam par spangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:142b-12: tshes grangs med cing skar ma med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:142b-13: bslab pa'i cho ga'ang yod ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:142b-14: gtsang spra med cing mi gtsang med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:142b-15: dag pa'i bya ba'ang yod ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:142b-16: dus dang tshod las rnam par grol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:142b-17: dag pa'i spyod pa rnam par spangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:142b-18: rang gi sngags rgyud sbyor ba shes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:142b-19: sems can kun gyi don yang byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:142b-20: ril bu dang ni ri rtsi dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:142b-21: chu bo chen po'i ngogs dag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:142b-22: rgya mtsho chen po'i 'gram dag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:142b-23: shing gcig dang ni dge ba'i gnas; ;ma mo'i khyim mam dur khrod dam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:142b-24: sna tshogs dam pa'i ldum ra dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:142b-25: lha khang dang ni mchod rten gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:142b-26: khyim mam bzhi mdo dag tu ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:143a-3: gnas ni brtag pa byas nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:143a-4: yid ni gang du dga' ba der //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:143a-5: sna tshogs bde mchod dam pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:143a-6: de ru bsgrubs na dngos grub 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:143a-7: sems sbyor med pa nyid las ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:143a-8: du mar dbye ba'i sgom pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:143a-9: ye shes lnga yi bdud rtsis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:143a-10: sa ni byug pa byas nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:143a-11: bzod pa'i pha rol phyin pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:143a-12: me tog 'bad pas dgram par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:143a-13: sna tshogs phyag rgya yid 'ong gdan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:143a-14: mnyam par bzhag pas rgya cher bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:143a-15: rtse gcig pa yi sems kyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:143a-16: bsam gtan pha rol phyin pa sgrub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:143a-17: tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi la gnas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:143a-18: bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:143a-19: dge ba bcu yang dmigs nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:143a-20: sems can kun gyi don yang bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:143a-21: phyi dang nang du bltas na ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:143a-22: chos rnams thams cad stong pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:143a-23: byang chub tshogs kyi mchog dam pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:143a-24: sems tsam la ni rab tu gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:143a-25: rang gi snying ga mkha' dkyil du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:143a-26: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gnas par bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:143a-27: de steng de nyid mchog gyur pa; ;ye shes lnga po zhi ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:143a-28: sna tshogs 'od zer gsal ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:143a-29: rnam par 'phro bas kun tu khyab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:143a-30: sngon grub pa rnams bskul nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:143b-0: byin gyis brlabs pa'ang @143b byed pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:143b-1: nam mkha'i khams ni sgom dga' bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:143b-2: dkyil 'khor mchog ni mthong ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:143b-3: til gyi gang bu lta bu yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:143b-4: lha dang khro bos khyab par mthong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:143b-5: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:143b-6: byang chub sems dang bla ma'i gtso //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:143b-7: lha mo sna tshogs mthong nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:143b-8: bdag gis mchod cing brjed par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:143b-9: sangs rgyas spros te sprul pa'i tshogs //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:144b-24: thod pa kha tv'am ga 'dzin cing //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:146b-23: mthong ba mkha' dang 'dra bar dri med dpal du gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:146b-24: sangs rgyas rjes dran rnal 'byor gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:146b-25: chos ni rjes su dran pa bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:146b-26: chos rjes dran pa'i rnal 'byor gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:146b-27: chos kyi sku ni rang byung 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:146b-28: dbus na gsal byed rnam par shes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:146b-29: ye shes mchog ni shes rnams kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:146b-30: shin tu gsal bar bsgoms pa las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:147a-1: med; ;rtag tu snying la gnas pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:147a-2: thig le gcig pu yi ge med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:147a-3: skyes bus de ni bsgoms gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:147a-4: ye shes skye bar gyur pa mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:147a-5: sems pa rjes dran rnal 'byor gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:147a-6: sems dpa' rjes su dran par bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:147a-7: sems dpa' rjes dran chos kyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:147a-8: chos kyi sems dpa' khyad par 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:147a-9: bdag ni snying rjes phan 'dogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:147a-10: smon lam dbang gis mthong ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:147a-11: mthong nas ji srid 'og tu ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:147a-12: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:147a-13: rdo rje sems dpa' kun mkhyen dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:147a-14: dgar dang ser dang de bzhin dmar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:147a-15: sngon po yi ni zhal dang bzhi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:147a-16: rlung gi dkyil 'khor rnam par bsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:147a-17: yi ge yam las yang dag 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:147a-18: sngo pa'i mdog can gzhu lta bu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:147a-19: rgyal mtshan gyis ni mtshan par bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:147a-20: dud pa'i phreng ba khyab par dmigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:147a-21: de yi steng du yi ge ram//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:147a-22: me yi dkyil 'khor mchog dam pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:147a-23: gru gsum pa la dmar ba'i mdog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:147a-25: nyi ma bye ba 'od mtha' yas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:147a-26: rdo rjes mtshan pa bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:147a-27: de yi steng du chu nyid de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:147a-28: yi ge bam mchog las byung ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:147a-29: du sha ra yi mdog 'dra ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:147a-30: zlum la 'od zer phreng ba can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:147a-32: lam las byung ba ser po ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:147a-33: zur bzhi pa la rdo rjes mtshan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:147a-35: rnal 'byor de steng bsgom pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:147b-0: ri rab @147b lhun po mchog gyur pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:147b-1: zur bzhi pa la rin chen bzhi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:147b-2: rtse mo brgyad kyis rnam par mdzes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:147b-3: yi ge sum las legs par byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:147b-4: 'od zer gzi brjid mchog dam pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:147b-5: de yi steng du bsam pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:147b-6: brum ni dkar po las byung ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:147b-7: de steng 'khor lor bcas pa dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:147b-8: khang pa brtsegs pa rnam par bsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:147b-9: zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:147b-10: rta babs bzhis ni rnam par brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:147b-11: dra ba dra phyed kyis mdzes shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:147b-12: ba dan phreng bas rnam par rgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:147b-13: zur gyi cha ni thams cad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:147b-14: sgo dang sgo khyud mtshams rnams su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:147b-15: rdo rje rin chen gyis brgyan cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:147b-16: phyi yi dkyil 'khor thig gdab bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:147b-17: de yi nang du 'khor lo ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:147b-18: brgyad po dkar po'i mdog can la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:147b-19: de yi dbus su padma che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:147b-20: sna tshogs 'dab ma brgyad pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:147b-21: lte ba ge sar gyis khyab pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:147b-22: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:147b-23: rdo rje sems dpa' rig mar bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:147b-24: dkar po ser po de bzhin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:147b-25: dmar dang ljang gu zhal bzhi pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:147b-26: zhi zhing dgod dang khro ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:147b-28: rdo rje dril bus mnyam par ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:147b-29: mdung dang dgra sta cang te'u dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:147b-30: gri gug thod pa kha tv'am ga /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:147b-31: tshangs pa'i pags pa gos su mnabs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:147b-32: zhags pa tshangs pa'i mgo bo dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:147b-33: phyag ni bcu gnyis de bzhin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:147b-34: sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:147b-35: dbu rgyan thod pa'i cod pan can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:147b-36: rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:147b-37: dpe byad mtshan dang yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:147b-38: thugs kyi ye shes dam tshig can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:148a-2: ji ltar thabs bzhin shes rab de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:148a-3: phyag rgya lnga po byin gyis brlab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:148a-4: rigs kyi dbye bas phye nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:148a-5: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:148a-6: bde ba chen po'i thabs sbyor bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:148a-7: sku ni gnyis su med par thim //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:148a-8: mnyam pa nyid las byung ba'i sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:148a-10: rnal 'byor ma dang bcas par byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:148a-11: g-yas bskum g-yon brkyang tshul gyis bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:148a-12: dkar sngon ser dmar zhal mdog ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:148a-14: sngar gyi rdo rje sems sogs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:148a-15: phyag mtshan rim par 'dzin pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:148a-16: thod pa'i phreng ba'i rgyan dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:148a-17: mgo bo'i phreng ba rlon pas spud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:148a-18: zla ba phyed pa rab 'dzin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:148a-19: zhal bzhi mche ba rnam par gtsigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:148a-20: spyan gsum phyag ni bcu gnyis pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:148a-21: tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha zhabs kyis gnon pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:148a-22: na ra'i rus pa'i rgyan can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:148a-23: rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbu rgyan can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:148a-24: phyag rgya drug gis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:148a-25: stag gi pags pa bgos pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:148a-26: sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro mas pang du 'khyud pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:148a-27: sku la thod pa dang gdug pa la sdigs mdzub kyi 'khor lo 'dzin pas 'khyud pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:148a-29: bde ba dang dgyes pas myos pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:148a-32: skye mched rnams byin gyis brlabs te sa'i khams ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:148b-10: nam mkha'i khams ni; kham ste; padma'i dra ba ma'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:148b-16: gzugs kyi phung po rnam par snang mdzad de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:148b-18: tshor ba'i phung po rdo rje rin chen te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:148b-19: aam gser btso ma'i mdog lta bu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:148b-21: padma gar gyi dbang phyug dmar po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:148b-22: 'du byed rdo rje rgyal po ho ljang gu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:148b-23: rnam par shes pa rdo rje sems dpa' h'um dkar po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:148b-24: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:148b-28: gti mug rdo rje dkar po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:148b-29: rna ba h'um zhe sdang rdo rje ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:148b-32: kham phrag dog rdo rje ste; ser po'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:148b-33: ngag chags pa rdo rje ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:148b-38: skye mched thams cad dbang phyug rdo rje ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:148b-49: de ltar lus ngag yid gsum gyi bar byin gyis brlab cing dmigs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:148b-50: de la shar gyi 'dab ma'i mkha' 'gro ma ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:148b-52: lho phyogs kyi 'dab ma la l'a ma ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:148b-55: nub phyogs kyi 'dab ma la dum skyes ma dmar mo /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:149a-1: can ma gser gyi mdog ser skya zhal gcig pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:149a-8: phyag rgya lngas rnam par brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:149a-9: thod pa dang kha tv'am ga dang cang te'u dang gri gug 'dzin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:149a-10: zhal gdong rjes su chags pas gnas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:149a-11: dgyes pa'i chags pas lta zhing reg pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:149a-12: mtshams bzhir bdud rtsi lnga'i bum pa'i steng du byang chub kyi sems kyis gang ba'i snod bzhi gzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:149a-13: shar du pre ta pu rir stobs po che dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:149a-14: 'khor lo'i shugs can ma nag po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:149a-15: byang du gri ha de ba tar rdo rje rin chen dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:149a-17: nub tu soo rashtara rta mgrin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:149a-19: lhor su warna dv'i par nam mkha'i snying po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:149a-20: 'khor lo'i go cha ma ljang gu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:149a-21: mer nag rar dpal khrag 'thung dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:149a-23: bden bral du sindhura padma gar gyi dbang phyug dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:149a-24: stobs chen ma ste zla ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:149a-26: rlung phyogs na ma ru tar rnam par snang mdzad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:149a-27: 'khor los bsgyur ma dud ka'i mdog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:149a-28: dbang ldan du ku lu tar rdo rje sems dpa' dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:149a-30: stobs po che la sogs pa'i dpa' bo ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:149b-1: phyag gnyis la 'khor lo dang dril bus 'khyud pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:149b-2: phyag gzhan la kha tv'am ga dang cang te'u 'dzin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:149b-5: 'khor lo'i shugs can ma la sogs pa'i lha mo ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:149b-10: spyan gsum pa; drag po'i gzugs can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:149b-12: gcer bu gnyis su med par sbyor bar mnyam par gnas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:149b-13: phyogs kyi gos can ma mgrin pa'i nor bu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:149b-20: g-yer kas 'og pag byas pa shar dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:149b-23: lho'i sgor kha gdong ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:149b-30: dbang ldan du ni gshin rje sreg ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:149b-31: gshin rje'i pho nya mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:149b-32: gshin rje mche ba ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:149b-34: ji ltar mkha' 'gro ma bzhi ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:149b-35: khva gdong ma la sogs pa'i dbye ba yang de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:149b-36: mtshams kyi lha mo gzugs gnyis pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:149b-38: yi dvags kyi gdan la bzhugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:150a-0: drag po chen po thugs rjes sems can @150a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:150a-2: dpa' bo 'di dag thams cad kyang dpral bar 'khor lo'i phreng ba can no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:150a-4: sku'i 'khor lo sa 'og na gnas pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:150a-5: bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor la bzhugs te dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma rnam pa sna tshogs pa chags pa'i mig gis blta zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:150a-6: sna tshogs ro bcud bde ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:150a-7: chags pa'i bde ba chen po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:150a-8: de ring du ni bdag gis rnyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:150a-9: aa la la ho dgyes pa che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:150a-10: bde ba chen po de nyid yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:150a-11: bde gshegs lha ni shin tu mdzes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:150a-12: glu 'di blangs pa tsam gyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:150a-13: dga' bas srid pa dag las grol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:150a-14: bde bar gshegs pa dag pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:150a-15: dkyil 'khor du ni rnam par brtag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:150a-16: mngal skyes glu yi dbang gyur par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:150a-18: mngal skyes sku yi 'khor lo ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:150a-19: ye shes dkyil 'khor bltas nas ni; ;mchod dang bstod pa byas nas gzhug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:150a-20: spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:150a-21: dngos dang dngos med rnam par bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:150a-22: rnal 'byor pa yis ma nor bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:150a-24: skye ba can gyi lus grub ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:150a-25: mkha' la spyod par the tshom med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:150a-26: aom shr'i k'a ya d'a ka ru lu ru lu bhr'um h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:150b-0: d'a ki n'i @150b dz'a la sham wa ra sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:150b-2: aom bhr'um ham ha bhr'um h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:150b-4: aom buddha d'a ki n'i ye bhr'um bee ro tsa n'i ye bhr'um h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:150b-6: aom bhr'um sarba buddha d'a ki n'i ye h'um bhr'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:150b-8: aom kshm'am ma h'a ba la kshm'am hum h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:150b-9: aom tsakra be ge hum h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:150b-10: aom ham ram badzra h'um h'um h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:150b-11: aom khanda ro he hum h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:150b-12: aom ha ya gr'i b'a hi hum h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:150b-13: aom shondi n'i ye hum h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:150b-14: aom h'um a'a k'a sh'a garbha hum h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:150b-15: aom tsakra warma n'i ye hum h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:150b-16: aom ki li shr'i he ru ka ki li hum h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:150b-17: aom su b'i re hum h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:150b-18: aom si li padma ni rte shva ra si li hum h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:150b-19: aom ma h'a ba le hum h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:150b-20: aom hi le bee ro tsa n'i ye hi li hum h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:150b-21: aom tsakra barti n'i ye hum h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:150b-22: aom dhi li badzra satva dhi li hum h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:150b-23: aom ma h'a birya hum h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:150b-24: aom k'a k'a sye hum h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:150b-25: aom au l'u k'a sye hum h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:150b-26: aom shv'a n'a sye hum h'um phat; aom s'u ka r'a sye hum h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:150b-27: aom ya ma d'a dh'i ye hum h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:150b-28: aom ya ma d'u t'i hum h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:150b-29: aom ya ma damsht'i n'i ye hum h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:150b-30: aom ma ma ma tha n'i ye hum h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:150b-31: aom d'a ki n'i ye hum h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:150b-32: aom l'a me hum h'um phat/

K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:165b-11: mchan khung gnyis su ni myu gu can dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:165b-14: nu ma gnyis su rdo rje ral pa can dang 'jigs byed chen mo ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:165b-17: lte ba'i dbus su stobs po che dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:165b-20: sna rtser ni rdo rje h'um mdzad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:165b-24: kha la ni rab bzang dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:165b-27: mgrin par ni rdo rje 'od dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:165b-31: snying la ni rdo rje 'jigs byed dang; rta rna ma'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:165b-33: bshad sgo la mig mi bzang dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:165b-36: gsung gi 'khor los la spyod pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:165b-38: mtshan ma la ni stobs po che dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:165b-41: gzhang la ni rdo rje rin chen dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:165b-45: bar'a gnyis su rta mgrin dang chang tshong ma'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:165b-46: su ste; byin pa gnyis la ni nam mkha'i snying po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:165b-50: sor mo rnams la zni dpal he ru ka dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:166a-1: rkang pa gnyis su ni padma gar gyi dbang phyug dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:166a-5: mthe bong gnyis la ni rnam par snang mdzad dang; 'khor los bsgyur ma'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:166a-7: pus mo gnyis su rdo rje sems dpa' dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:166a-10: sku'i 'khor lo sa 'og na gnas pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:166a-15: dum skyes ma dang gzugs can ma ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:166a-16: glang po che'i pags pa 'dzin pa'i khu tshur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:166a-26: thod pa'i kha tv'am ga ma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:166a-27: gshin rje pho nya ma ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:166a-29: gshin rje mche ba ma ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:166a-33: byang chub sems kyi snod ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:166a-53: rnam par shes pa'i phung po ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:166b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:166b-2: dpal rdo rje he ru ka'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:166b-13: skye mched thams cad ni dbang phyug rdo rje /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:166b-20: aom ha snying la rdo rje sems dpa'/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:166b-21: na ma: hi mgo la rnam par snang mdzad /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:166b-22: sv'ah'a hu spyi gtsug la padma gar gyi dbang phyug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:166b-23: boo shat he dpung pa gnyis la he ru ka /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:166b-24: h'um h'um ho mig gnyis su rdo rje nyi ma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:166b-25: phat ham yan lag thams cad du rta mchog gi go cha'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:166b-26: aom bam lte ba la rdo rje phag mo'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:166b-27: ham yom snying la ya mi ni'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:166b-32: h'um h'um spyi gtsug la skrag byed ma'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:166b-34: yan lag thams cad kyi go cha'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:166b-35: mdzub mo mdud byas gung mo nges par sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:166b-36: mthe bong rdo rje brtan por rab tu sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:166b-37: de yi dpral ba'i dbus su rab bzhag nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:166b-38: bskor zhing bskor bas kun tu bskor bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:166b-39: rkang pa mnan cing steng du blta //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:166b-40: gyen du phem gyi sgra sgrog cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:166b-41: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams bzhugs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:167a-0: rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'i sbyor bas dgug cing rab tu @167a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:167a-1: gzhug ste bcing la dbang du bsdu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:167a-2: dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma des nam mkha'i dkyil yongs su gang bar mthong bzhin du thod pa bdud rtsi lngas yongs su gang bas stangs thabs dang bcas pas dbang bskur dbul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:167a-3: ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:167a-4: de bzhin gshegs kun khrus gsol pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:167a-5: lha yi chu ni dag pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:167a-6: de bzhin bdag gis khrus bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:167a-7: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi she ka ta sa ma ya shri ye hum h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:167a-8: rlung dang me'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du thod pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:167a-9: der yi ge aa bskyed pa la ye shes lnga'i bdud rtsis yongs su gang ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:167a-10: zla ba'i cha bcu drug pa la yi ge h'um dang a'a: aom gyis byin gyis brlabs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:167a-11: yi ge gsum pa'i spro ba las 'khor lo gsum 'byung bar bsgom mo; ;aom sa ma ya shuddha: sarba dharma: sa ma ya shuddhonyham/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:167a-12: chos thams cad kyi bcud mnyam par gnas par bsam mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:167a-13: ye shes lnga yi sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:167a-14: rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu btung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:167a-15: aom badzra aa mri ta au ta ka h'um tha tha tram aa kham h'um aom//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:167a-16: ye shes bzlas pa'i sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:167a-17: 'khor lo mchog ni rnam par spro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:167a-18: dung chen phreng ba blangs nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:167a-19: de nas de la bzlas par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:167a-20: rang srog rtsol ba byas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:167a-21: bsgoms pas de ma thag tu 'bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:167a-22: aom badzra shr'i he he ru ru kam h'um h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:167a-23: aom t'a ki n'a dz'i la sam ba ra sv'ah'a /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:167b-4: aom sarba buddha t'a ki n'i ye badzra barnna n'i ye hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:167b-7: ci steng bar ma gyur na //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:167b-9: ngal bar gyur na rnam dag bsgom //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:167b-18: sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:167b-26: sems kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:168a-14: dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:168a-29: yang dag ba'i rtsol ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:168a-31: yang dag pa'i dran pa ni /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:168b-6: mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi skyed pa ni /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:168b-23: rdo rje sku yi dpa' bo dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:168b-24: bha ga'i dbus su rnam par bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:168b-25: ji ltar sgom pa'i rim pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:168b-26: de ltar 'khor lo gsum du sbyor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:168b-27: bha ga lnga po bdag gis bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:168b-28: dbus su mkha' 'gro ma sbyor dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:168b-30: rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dbye la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:168b-31: bha ga'i dbus su 'khor lo gsum //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:169a-4: de 'di bha ga'i dbus dag tu //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:169a-6: dpa' bo gcig pu he ru ka /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:169a-7: ji bzhin phag mo de bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:169a-8: sku mdog zhal dang phyag dang mtshan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:169a-9: de nyid sna tshogs padmar bsgom //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:169a-11: thod pa lhan cig mnyam par ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:169a-12: lnga yi dbye ba bdag sbyor te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:169a-13: rnal 'byor ma yi rim pa bsgom //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:169a-15: 'khyud pa yi ni phyag rgya can //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:169a-17: rang rang gi ni rnal 'byor ma //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:169a-23: de yi bha ga'i dbus su ni //
