K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:248b-16: aom shr'i r'u pa ni r'um hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:248b-17: 'di ni lnga po'i bdag nyid kyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:248b-18: mtshams kyi mkha' 'gro ma'i sngags ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:248b-19: aom shr'i buddha d'a ki n'i hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:248b-20: aom shr'i karm'a d'a ki n'i hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:248b-21: aom shr'i padma d'a ki n'i hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:248b-22: aom shr'i ratna hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:248b-23: sgo ru mkha' gro ma yi sngags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:248b-25: bzhi po sna tshogs mdog can te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:248b-26: ji bzhin rigs kyis kun la khyab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:248b-27: aom h'um r'u pe hum h'um phat//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:248b-28: aom su r'u pe hum h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:248b-29: aom badzra dunti hum h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:248b-30: aom pra bh'a ka ri hum h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:249a-2: lha mo bzhi po dgod pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:249a-3: sku lus dkar po'i mdog can la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:249a-4: de yi gsang sngags bshad pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:249a-5: aom badzra pa d'a ba mu kh'i hum h'um phat; aom gho ra mu khi hum h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:249a-6: aom badzra gho ne hum h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:249a-7: aom ya sha svi ni h'um h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:249a-8: lho phyogs kyi ni snam bu la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:249a-9: lha mo bzhi po dgod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:249a-10: sku mdog dag ni ser ba ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:249a-11: de yi sngags su bshad pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:249a-12: aom badzra d'u ti hum h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:249a-13: aom badzra na kha hum h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:249a-14: aom badzra koo ma r'i hum h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:249a-15: aom badzra kam putsdzi hum h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:249a-16: nub phyogs kyi ni snam bu la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:249a-17: lha mo bzhi po sku mdog dmar po can gyi sngags yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:249a-18: aom badzra be t'a li hum h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:249a-19: aom badzra sa yi ki h'um h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:249a-20: aom gandha ri hum h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:249a-21: aom ba mi ba da ne hum h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:249a-22: byad gi snam bu la lha mo bzhi sku mdog ljang gu ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:249a-23: de'i gsang sngags bshad pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:249a-24: ao tsanda sham kha re hum h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:249a-25: aom bhri ku ta hum h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:249a-26: aom bi shva r'u pe hum h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:249a-27: aom badzra kaddha ni hum h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:249a-28: dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams bzhi ru lha mo bzhi po gzugs gnyis pa'i mdog can te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:249a-30: aom shr'i badzra kha le hum h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:249a-31: aom badzra ma le hum h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:249a-32: aom badzra ya sha: ka ri hum h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:249a-33: aom badzra n'a l'a ra ke hum h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:249b-0: sgo rnams su ni lha mo bzhi po sna tshogs pa'i mdog can drag po'i gzugs ldan @249b pa ste; de'i sngags su bshad pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:249b-1: shar du aom shri badzra pam ge le dza: dza: hum h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:249b-2: lho ru aom shr'i badzra dzva li ni h'um hum h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:249b-3: nub tu aom shr'i badzra kunda li pam bam hum h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:249b-4: byang du aom shr'i badzra phee ra bi ho hum h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:249b-5: thams cad gsal byed mtha' ru ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:249b-6: shr'i ni spyar zhing mchog rim bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:249b-7: sngags pas de ltar bzlas na ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:249b-8: mkha' 'gro ma ni dra ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:249b-9: sdom pa'i dngos grub thob pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:249b-10: zla ba drug gis bde dbang 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:249b-11: gcug tu byas te bsdus na ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:249b-12: rnal 'byor chen po gzi byin can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:249b-14: gsang sngags 'di dag thams cad ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:249b-16: gsang sngags rgyal po 'grub pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:249b-17: snying po dag ni bzlas pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:249b-18: dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma grub cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:249b-20: gzhan gyi lus su zhugs 'gro zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:249b-21: mi snang ba dag thob nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:249b-22: rnal 'byor chen po rnam par spyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:249b-23: sna tshogs gzugs ni 'dzin pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:249b-24: mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:249b-25: dam tshig gi sdom pa las 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:249b-26: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:249b-27: sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro'i cho ga'i rim //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:249b-28: sngar bshad sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:249b-29: lung la sogs pa'i rim pa bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:250a-2: sangs rgyas mu stegs can yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:250a-3: rtag tu lung ni spang mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:250a-4: dkon mchog gsum ni mi spang zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:250a-5: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:250a-6: rtag tu bdag ni skyabs su 'gro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:250a-7: shes rab pha rol phyin dmigs na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:250a-9: gcig car 'jug pa'i sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:250a-10: bdag gi lus ni rnam par bsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:250a-11: sngo zhing drag la bzhin rnam sgyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:250a-13: zhal gyi mche ba rnam par gtsigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:250a-14: ral pa zla phyed spyi gtsug 'chid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:250a-15: sna tshogs rdo rjes ral pa gnod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:250a-16: thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:250a-17: rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:250a-18: bam h'um badzra las byung sku lus can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:250a-19: phyag rgya drug dang yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:250a-20: stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:250a-21: skyil krung phyed pas legs par gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:250a-22: spyan gsum drag po'i sku lus can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:250a-23: mgrin pa bzhi la zhal bzhi pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:250a-24: bcu gnyis phyag dang yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:250a-25: stong pa'i ye shes yang dag mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:250a-26: gdug pa kun gyi thod pa'i phreng //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:250a-27: dus mtha' las byung do shal can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:250a-28: gdug pa kun ni zhabs 'og gnon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:250a-29: nyon mongs 'jigs byed mgo bo dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:250a-30: sred pa gti mug phrag dog ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:250a-31: dus mtshan mo ni khas phub la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:250b-0: gdug pa'i bgegs ni @250b 'jigs pa can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:250b-1: thams cad zhabs kyi 'og tu gnon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:250b-2: nam mkha' dang ni skya ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:250b-3: dkar ba dang ni dmar ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:250b-4: ljang gu steng du bltas pa'i zhal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:250b-5: rdo rje dril bu mnyam ldan pa; ;phag mo dag dang bde bas 'khyud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:250b-6: kun tu gnyis med sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:250b-7: chos rnams kun gyi ro gcig tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:250b-8: sbyangs pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:250b-9: dpal gyi bde ba chen po ni; ;rdo rje he ru ka nyid yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:250b-10: thod pa dang ni kha tv'am 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:250b-11: chos kyi 'khor lo mkhar gsil dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:250b-12: lhung bzed mdung dang zhags pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:250b-13: lcags kyu mgo bo cang te'u dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:250b-14: g-yas dang g-yon pa'i phyag dag gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:250b-15: na ra'i pags pa brkyang nas bsnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:250b-16: shar du m'a ta ng+gi dang dom bi ka /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:250b-17: dza ra ki dang pukki si //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:250b-18: kha ta ki dang sha ba ri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:250b-19: dzi ba ri dang sa ma ri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:250b-20: lha mo brgyad po de dag ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:250b-21: ji bzhin rim pas rjes su dgod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:250b-22: ser dang sngo dang de bzhin dmar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:250b-23: dud pa yi ni mdog can te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:250b-24: dmar dang ljang dang dud ka'i mdog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:250b-25: brgyad pa dkar po nyid yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:250b-26: sgo rnams su ni dgod bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:250b-27: khrag 'thung rdo rje gtum mo dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:250b-28: rdo rje srid mchog ma dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:250b-29: rdo rje 'jigs byed drag mo ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:250b-30: gdul dka' thams cad gsol mdzad cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:250b-31: thal pa sprin mdog ljang gu dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:250b-32: dmar dang sngo dang lhag par 'jigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:250b-33: brgyad pa'i dbus su chos mkhar gsil //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:250b-34: thod pa cang te'u gri gug ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:251a-2: sgo rnams su ni lha mo bzhi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:251a-3: thod pa kha tv'am mi 'jigs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:251a-4: chos kyi mkhar gsil cang te'u //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:251a-5: zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:251a-6: yi dvags gdan gyi steng du ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:251a-7: skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:251a-8: bsod snyoms pa dang chos gos gsum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:251a-9: phyis mi len dang tsog bu ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:251a-10: gzhi ji bzhin dang stan cig pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:251a-11: bla gab med dang shing drung pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:251a-12: dgon pa pa dang dur khrod dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:251a-13: khrod pa dang ni phying ba pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:251a-14: 'di dag ji lta'i rim pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:251a-15: sbyangs pa'i yon tan rnam dag bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:251a-16: ye shes mnyam pa'i dam tshig mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:251a-17: ro gcig tu ni rnam par bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:251a-18: aom shr'i ma h'a su kha badzra he he ru ru kam a'a: hum h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:251a-19: aom mam ma tam gi hum h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:251a-20: aom dam badzra dom bi ni hum h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:251a-21: aom ram r'a dza ki hum h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:251a-22: aom pum pukka si hum h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:251a-23: aom kham kha ta kam hum h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:251a-24: aom sham sh'a ba ri hum h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:251a-25: aom dzim dzi ba ri hum h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:251a-26: aom sam sa ma ri h'um h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:251a-27: aom tem he he ru ki hum h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:251a-28: aom bam badzra tsanti hum h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:251a-29: aom h'um badzra r'aksha si hum h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:251a-30: aom bhem badzra bhee ra b'i hum h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:251a-31: de kun gcer bu skra grol ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:251a-32: spyan gsum pa la zhi ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:251a-33: mche ba rnam gtsigs lce bskyod cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:251a-34: phyag rgya lnga yis sku lus brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:251a-35: thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:251a-36: bzhad dang zhi dang snying rje dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:251b-0: sgeg @251b pa dang ni rdam pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:251b-1: drag cing khro ba'i nyams can te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:251b-2: bzlas dang sgom pa spro zhing bsdu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:251b-3: lus dag yid la bde bar gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:251b-4: sems can mos pa sna tshogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:251b-5: gdul ba'i thabs kyi bde ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:251b-6: yul la yongs su spyod pa na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:251b-8: sems can thams cad 'di yis bde [?]//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:251b-9: 'chi med bde ba'i longs spyod kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:251b-10: ye shes 'bras bu rnyed pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:251b-11: 'di ni sems can thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:251b-13: mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:251b-14: sbyangs pa'i yon tan bskyed pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa gsum pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:251b-15: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:251b-16: char dbab cho ga'i rim pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:251b-18: lte ba ge sar bcas pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:251b-19: de yi dbus su rdo rje che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:251b-20: mche ba rnam gtsigs 'jigs pa can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:251b-21: phyag brgyad pa la zhal bzhi pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:251b-23: rdo rje mtshon ni gsor mdzad cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:251b-24: sdigs mdzub zhags par ldan pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:251b-25: thod pa dang ni kha tv'am 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:251b-26: lcags kyu dang ni mdung bsnams shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:251b-27: dpa' bo'i pags pa bsnams shing 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:251b-28: cang te'u dang ni brgyad par bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:251b-29: g-yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:251b-30: chu lha 'jigs pa myos pa gnon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:251b-31: zla ba phyed pa ral pa 'ching //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:251b-32: sna tshogs rdo rjes rnam par brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:252a-2: thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:252a-3: stag gi pags pa gos su man bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:252a-4: thod pa'i phreng ba'i cod pan mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:252a-5: mchus gnon zhal gdong rnam sgyur zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:252a-6: khro bar lta zhing 'jigs par gzigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:252a-7: 'dab ma brgyad la klu brgyad bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:252a-8: mtha' yas dang ni nor rgyas dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:252a-10: dung skyong dang ni stobs kyi rgyu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:252a-11: dga' bo dang ni brgyad yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:252a-12: dkar dang sngo dang dmar dang ljang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:252a-13: ser dang dud pa'i mdog can te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:252a-14: ljang gu dang ni ser po ste; ;thal mo sbyar bar byas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:252a-15: bcom ldan 'das la mngon phyogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:252a-16: 'jigs pas bka' drin slong bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:252a-17: skrag pas lta zhing gnas pa 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:252a-18: bcom ldan sku lus sngon po can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:252a-20: g-yas pa dud ka dmar po ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:252a-21: g-yon pa ljang gu dud ka 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:252a-22: steng gi zhal ni mkha' lding gdong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:252a-24: nyi ma dmar po'i gzi brjid can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:252a-25: nyi ma bcu gnyis nyi mnyam 'od //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:252a-26: phag mo dag gis mgul 'khyud cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:252a-27: byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:252a-28: yang na phyag ni bcu gnyis pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:252a-29: bde chen mchog ni bcu gnyis pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:252a-30: gri gug tshangs pa'i mgo bo dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:252a-31: rdo rje dril bu yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:252b-0: lha mo'i @252b mchu ni rnam par 'tshir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:252b-1: gcer bu dbu skra grol ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:252b-2: spyan gsum pa la sku rags can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:252b-3: dzambu'i chu bo mchog gi sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:252b-4: gnyis su med par sbyor bar gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:252b-5: klu ni rang gi chung mar bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:252b-6: chu lha'ang chung mar bcas pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:252b-7: chu lha'i lus ni dkar po can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:252b-8: bka' drin dag ni slong bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:252b-9: snying gar ye shes 'khor lo dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:252b-10: de mdog phyag dang zhal yang skyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:252b-11: de yi snying ga h'um n'am h'um dgod cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:252b-12: lus ngag yid kyang de bzhin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:252b-13: klu yi rang snying de nyid la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:252b-14: h'um n'am h'um ni rnam par dgod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:252b-15: gsang sngags rgyal po'i cho ga ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:252b-16: khro bo'i tshig ltar bzlas brjod bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:252b-18: khron pa'am klu yi mtsho dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:252b-19: rdzing bu lteng ka rnams su ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:252b-20: blo can khro bo'i bzlas pa bya; ;yang na klu yi gnas su ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:252b-21: sgom pa bzlas pa dag la 'jug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:252b-22: aom shr'i badzra he he ru ru kam h'um n'am n'a ga bar sh'a pa ya h'um d'a ki n'i dz'a la sham ba ra h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:252b-23: 'di dag bsgom te khri tsam bzla //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:252b-24: dus bzhi dag tu stong du 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:252b-25: zhag bdun gyis ni nges par yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:252b-27: dam tshig sbyin sreg mchod dus su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:252b-28: glu dang gar ni nyer ldan pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:252b-29: 'o ma dag ni bza' zhing btung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:252b-30: rnal 'byor pas ni klu brgyad bzla //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:252b-31: 'o ma'i khrus kyi cho ga yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:252b-32: 'o mas sbyin sreg bsreg blugs bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:253a-2: 'o ma'i shing gi yam shing dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:253a-3: 'o mar bcas pas sbyin sreg bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:253a-4: bum pa 'o mas yongs su dgang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:253a-5: me sogs mtshams dang phyogs rnams su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:253a-6: 'o mar bcas pa'i gtor ma sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:253a-7: aom aam aa nanta ya h'um n'am h'um sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:253a-8: aom bam b'a su ke h'um n'am h'um sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:253a-9: aom tam taksha ka h'um n'am h'um sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:253a-10: aom pam padma h'um n'am h'um sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:253a-11: aom mam mah'a padma h'um n'am h'um sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:253a-12: aom sham sham kha p'a la h'um n'am h'um sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:253a-13: aom kam karko ta h'um n'am h'um sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:253a-14: aom aam aa nanta tapta h'um n'am h'um sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:253a-15: aom h'um bam ba ru na ya n'a g'a dhi pa te ye n'a gam barsh'a pa ya h'um n'am h'um sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:253a-16: 'di bzlas khro bo dang bcas pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:253a-17: kun gyi bzlas pa khri tsam bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:253a-19: dbang po thul cing yod mi smra; ;bri gzugs spangs pa'i mngon sum du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:253a-20: khri tsam bzlas na mngon du 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:253a-21: mngon sum du ni dngos grub cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:253a-22: smras pa tsam gyis char 'bebs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:253a-23: 'di la the tshom ma byed cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:253a-24: dngul gyi snod kyi nang du ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:253a-25: yungs kar dang ni chu blugs la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:253a-26: de la nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du yongs su bzlas te sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs la dri chu dang 'om bsres pas khrus byas te chu 'gram gyis sbrus pa las klu'i gzugs byas la nub tu mgo bstan te mgo bo dgu la chus dbang bskur te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:253b-0: de nas chu bo'i @253b nang du bzhug go //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:253b-1: de ma thag tu lhas char 'bebs shing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:253b-4: nags tshal rnams ni 'phel bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:253b-5: sems can thams cad bde reg nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:253b-6: phan tshun khro bo'i gzugs can ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:253b-7: bdag bsgoms rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:253b-8: rang gti snyin ga kho nar ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:253b-9: he ru rdo rje bsgoms pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:253b-11: ri'i steng du 'dzegs te rtse gsum pa la yongs su bzlas na ser ba gcod par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:253b-12: cang te'u la yongs su bzlas na me mched pa'i me rengs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:253b-13: zhags pa la yongs su bzlas na 'gugs par byed /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:253b-14: thod pa la yongs su bzlas na khrag 'gugs par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:253b-15: dgra sta la yongs su bzlas na gsod par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:253b-16: kha tv'am ga la yongs su bzlas na zhi bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:253b-17: gri gug la yongs su bzlas na 'jig rten gsum du rgyu ba gsod par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:253b-18: mgo bo la yongs su bzlas na 'chi ba slong bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:253b-19: rdo rje gsor zhing yongs su bzlas na sa 'og gi dngos grub tu 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:253b-20: dril bu la yongs su bzlas na mi dga' ba yongs su 'gugs par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:253b-21: glang po che'i pags pa la yongs su bzlas te bting na bar snang la 'phur bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:253b-22: dpag tshad stong phrag brgyar 'gro zhing slar ldog go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:254a-1: yongs su bzlas na pha rol gyi mdun du mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:254a-2: sa steng du ni kun spyod cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:254a-3: ci bde bar ni gnas par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:254a-4: mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bal ma'i bla ma las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:254a-5: char dbab pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa bzhi'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:254a-6: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:254a-7: gsang ba mchog ni mdor pa sdus nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:254a-8: skad cig gis ni bdag sgom pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:254a-9: he ru ka dpal gzugs su bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:254a-10: sdo zhing drag po rnam sgyur pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:254a-11: drag po spyang sum zhal drug mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:254a-12: zla ba phyed pa ral pa 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:254a-13: sna tshogs rdo rje dbu mchog la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:254a-14: thod pa'i phreng ba'i dpu rgyan can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:254a-15: rdo rje phreng bas rnam par brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:254a-16: sku la mgo bo'i do shal can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:254a-17: phyag rgya drug gis rnam par brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:254a-18: stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:254a-19: phag mo yis ni sku la brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:254a-20: zhabs gcig pa ni bzhengs pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:254a-21: g-yas pa ser la dud pa'i mdog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:254a-22: g-yon pa dmar la ljang gu 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:254a-23: steng gi zhal ni rta gdong ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:254a-24: dkar zhing sprin mdog drag cing 'dzigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:254a-25: rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:254a-26: lha mo mchu ni 'tshir ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:254a-27: rgyal ba'i pags pa gos su man bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:254a-29: thod pa dang ni kha tv'am 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:254a-30: rdo rje mtshan gyis brgyan pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:254b-0: zhags pa @254b lcags kyu phyag na bsnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:254b-1: cang te'u dang ni mgo bo 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:254b-2: gri gug zhags pa de bzhin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:254b-3: phyag ni bcu gnyis dag tu bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:254b-4: dkyil 'khor dag ni thams cad kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:254b-5: zhabs gcig tu ni rnam par bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:254b-6: glang po'i gdong dang byi 'u'i gdong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:254b-7: seng+ge'i gdong yang de bzhin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:254b-8: dang po khyi yi gdong yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:254b-9: gnyis pa 'ug pa'i gdong yang yin; ;gsum pa phag gi gdong yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:254b-10: bzhi pa khra yi gdong can no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:254b-11: gnas kyi dbyibs kyi chos bdag nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:254b-12: sna tshogs gzugs ri chen po 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:254b-13: mtha' yas rnam rgyal grags pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:254b-14: thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:254b-16: de bzhin bsgom zhing rnam bsgom ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:254b-17: sna tshogs gzugs can rin chen bzhin; ;bdag nyid chen po rnam par rol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:254b-18: mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:254b-19: las sna tshogs sgrub pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa lnga pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:254b-20: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:254b-21: phag mo'i mchog ni sgrub ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:254b-22: bskyed pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:254b-23: bdag nyid bsgom zhing rnam par bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:254b-24: sku ni nyi ma bcu gnyis gzi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:254b-26: me tog bantu ka lta bu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:254b-27: zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:254b-28: rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:255a-0: sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis @255a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:255a-2: thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:255a-3: rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:255a-4: dbu skra mdzes pas 'khril ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:255a-5: thabs kyi zhal mchu rnam 'tshir zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:255a-6: mda' dang gzhu ni 'dzin pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:255a-7: rna ba'i mthar thug 'gengs par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:255a-8: thod pa dang ni kha tv'am 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:255a-9: lcags kyu mchog gis 'gugs pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:255a-10: padma dmar po'i dbus bzhugs shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:255a-11: 'dod pa thams cad rab tu stsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:255a-12: yang na phyag ni bcu gnyis pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:255a-13: zhal drug lha mo'i sku lus 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:255a-14: steng gi zhal ni phag rgod gdong /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:255a-15: drag po gzi brjid 'jigs pa'i gzi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:255a-16: shar gyi 'dab la rdo rje gsang ba'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:255a-17: g-yon pa'i phyogs su rdo rje dam tshig mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:255a-18: nub kyi phyogs su rdo rje gzi brjid mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:255a-19: lho yi phyogs su rdo rje rin chen mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:255a-20: me yi phyogs su rdo rje ye shes mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:255a-21: bden bral phyogs su rdo rje rig mchog ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:255a-22: rlung gi phyogs su rdo rje grub mchog ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:255a-23: dbang ldan phyogs su rdo rje thal mchog ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:255a-24: sgo la rdo rje 'bar mchog ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:255a-25: rdo rje gzi brjid mchog ma ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:255a-26: rdo rje khro bo mchog ma dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:255a-27: rdo rje mche ba mchog ma 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:255a-28: lha mo de dag thams cad kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:255a-29: dmar ba'i mdog can zhal gsum pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:255a-30: phyag drug pa la spyan gsum pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:255a-31: sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:255a-32: dbu skra dag ni grol ba ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:255b-0: @255b thams cad rgyan gyis rnam brgyan cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:255b-1: rdo rje dril bu mnyam ldan pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:255b-2: rang gi lus kyis thabs la 'khril //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:255b-3: zhags pa dang ni lcags kyu dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:255b-4: thod pa dang ni kha tv'am 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:255b-5: grva bzhi dag tu mda' gzhu dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:255b-6: yongs su 'gengs pa gnas par bzhag //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:255b-7: sgo ru g-yas brkyang zhabs kyis bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:255b-8: gcer bu rnam par 'gyur ba'i zhal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:255b-9: thams cad yi dvags gdan la bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:255b-10: rdo rje gsor zhing sdigs mdzub dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:255b-11: zhags pa dang ni yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:255b-12: gzhan yang phan tshun dag tu yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:255b-13: ji ltar 'khor la sogs phyag 'tshal; ;de snyid ye shes lha mo ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:255b-14: sku gsung thugs dang bcas pa bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:255b-15: ye shes dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:255b-16: chos kyi ro ni mnyam par thim //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:255b-17: ye shes bzlas pa spros nas ni; ;cho ga'i rim pas yang dag bsdu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-004:255b-18: dam tshig mchog gi bzlas pa yis //
